Legacy HTM Netsuite Refresh Token_passwo.metadata: Secure string for 'password' of 'Legacy HTM Netsuite Refresh Token'

userProperties.name: Destination
userProperties.value: @{item().FileSystem}/@{concat(item().SchemaName, '/', item().TableName, '/', activity('Get EST Date').output.firstRow.Year, '/', activity('Get EST Date').output.firstRow.Month, '/', activity('Get EST Date').output.firstRow.Day)}/@{concat(item().TableName, '-', activity('Get EST Date').output.firstRow.EST)}

oracleReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM @{item().SchemaName}.@{item().TableName} VERSIONS BETWEEN TIMESTAMP TO_TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(REPLACE('@{addminutes(item().LastRefreshStart,-15)}','T',' '),'Z',''), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE versions_operation IN ('D','U','I') AND versions_endtime IS NULL

activities.name: Glovia Raw Data Copy - SQL Pool

oracleReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM @{item().SchemaName}.@{item().TableName} VERSIONS BETWEEN TIMESTAMP TO_TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(REPLACE('@{addminutes(item().LastRefreshStart,-15)}','T',' '),'Z',''), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF') AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE versions_operation IN ('D','U','I') AND versions_endtime IS NULL

activities.name: Glovia Create Table Or Merge Data

dependsOn.activity: Glovia Raw Data Copy - SQL Pool
Modineer Netsuite Raw Data Copy - Data Lake

activities.name: Modineer Netsuite Raw Data Copy - Data Lake

query.value: SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE lastmodifieddate >= TO_TIMESTAMP(REPLACE(REPLACE('@{addminutes('2021-11-30 14:00:34.457',-15)}','T',' '),'Z',''), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.FF')

oracleReaderQuery.value: @SELECT * FROM [activity('Get All Table Data').output.SchemaName].[activity('Get All Table Data').output.TableName]

userProperties.value: @{'unified-data-cluster'}/@{concat(variables('SchemaName'), '/', variables('TableName'), '/', activity('Get EST Date').output.firstRow.Year, '/', activity('Get EST Date').output.firstRow.Month, '/', activity('Get EST Date').output.firstRow.Day)}/@{concat(variables('TableName'), '-', activity('Get EST Date').output.firstRow.EST)}

properties.description: Connection to your Azure Data Lake Store
Access to the Oracle server through a self hosted runtime.

Integration runtime for the Glovia Server.
Runtime to connect the Netsuite ODBC to to synapse.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		abbrevtype as string,
		balsegstatus as short,
		billingstatus as boolean,
		closedate as date,
		committed as boolean,
		createdby as short,
		createddate as date,
		currency as boolean,
		custbodyhtallowworkorderclose as boolean,
		custbodyhtisclosedworkorderbuildunbld as boolean,
		custbodyhtproducionschedulewoline as integer,
		custbodyhtproductionschedule as short,
		custbodyhtsalesorder as integer,
		custbodyhtsalesorderquantity as short,
		custbodyhtworkorderttype as boolean,
		daysopen as short,
		entity as short,
		exchangerate as boolean,
		id as integer,
		includeinforecast as boolean,
		isfinchrg as boolean,
		isreversal as boolean,
		lastmodifiedby as short,
		lastmodifieddate as date,
		nexus as boolean,
		number as integer,
		ordpicked as boolean,
		paymenthold as boolean,
		posting as boolean,
		postingperiod as short,
		printedpickingticket as boolean,
		recordtype as string,
		shipcomplete as boolean,
		status as string,
		trandate as date,
		trandisplayname as string,
		tranid as integer,
		transactionnumber as integer,
		type as string,
		typebaseddocumentnumber as integer,
		userevenuearrangement as boolean,
		visibletocustomer as boolean,
		void as boolean,
		voided as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['legacy-htm/work-order-headers','legacy-htm/2-processed-data/work-order-headers'],
	format: 'json',
	fileSystem: 'unified-data-cluster',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy','MM-dd-yyyy','MM.dd.yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'double',
	booleanFormat: ['true', 'false'],
	wildcardPaths:['legacy-htm/work-order-headers/*']) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'json',
	fileSystem: 'unified-data-cluster',
	folderPath: 'legacy-htm/1-staged-data/work-order-headers',
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1

parameters{
	SchemaName as string,
	TableName as string,
	KeyColumns as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> NewData
NewData alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'unified-data-cluster',
	folderPath: (concatWS('/',$SchemaName,$TableName,'Processed')),
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:(split($KeyColumns, ',')),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss',
	booleanFormat: ['1', '0'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> SinkToAzureTable

properties.description: Takes table name and key columns to remove duplicates from non-hash partitioned tables.

content.query:
DECLARE @tablname nvarchar(50)
SET @tablname = 'GLOVIA_PROD.WO'

DELETE FROM @tablename
WHERE CONCAT(CCN,MAS_LOC,WO_NUM,WO_LINE) IN (SELECT id
FROM (SELECT CONCAT(CCN,MAS_LOC,WO_NUM,WO_LINE) AS id,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CCN,MAS_LOC,WO_NUM,WO_LINE ORDER BY CCN,MAS_LOC,WO_NUM,WO_LINE) AS rnum
    FROM @tablename)t
    WHERE t.rnum > 1);

CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.usp_DynamicMerge
    @SchemaName NVARCHAR(25),
    @TableName NVARCHAR(50),
    @JoinStatement NVARCHAR(4000),
    @keyColumns NVARCHAR(4000),
    @keyColumnsSplit = NVARCHAR(4000)

AS  
SELECT *
FROM sys.tables

DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(4000) = 'MERGE '+ @SchemaName +'.'+ @TableName + 'AS tgt  
USING delta.' +@TableName + ' as src
    ON ' + @keyColumns + ' WHEN NOT MATCHED BY SOURCE 
    THEN DELETE
WHEN MATCHED
    THEN UPDATE SET tgt.Quantity = tgt.Quantity - src.OrderQty,
                    tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE()  
OUTPUT deleted.*, $action, inserted.* into'
GO  

EXECUTE sp_executesql   
          N'SELECT * FROM AdventureWorksPDW2012.dbo.DimEmployee   
          WHERE EmployeeKey = @level',  
          N'@level TINYINT',  
          @level = 109; 
GO

SELECT 
  ROUTINE_SCHEMA,
  ROUTINE_NAME
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.ROUTINES
WHERE ROUTINE_TYPE = 'PROCEDURE';

WITH cte
AS (SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER()
OVER (
partition BY CONCAT(CCN,MAS_LOC,WO_NUM,WO_LINE)
ORDER BY (SELECT NULL) ) AS row_num
FROM GLOVIA_PROD.WO)
DELETE FROM cte
WHERE row_num > 1

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'PO' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'GLOVIA_PROD')
CREATE TABLE GLOVIA_PROD.PO
	(
	 [PUR_CCN] nvarchar(500),
	 [PO_NUM] nvarchar(500),
	 [PO_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [MAS_LOC] nvarchar(500),
	 [ITEM] nvarchar(500),
	 [REVISION] nvarchar(500),
	 [VEN_ITEM] nvarchar(500),
	 [VEN_REVISION] nvarchar(500),
	 [STK] nvarchar(500),
	 [QTY_ORD] numeric(38,18),
	 [QTY_REC] numeric(38,18),
	 [REQD_DATE] datetime2(7),
	 [UM] nvarchar(500),
	 [UNIT_PRICE] numeric(38,18),
	 [WO_NUM] nvarchar(500),
	 [WO_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [OPERATION] nvarchar(500),
	 [SO] nvarchar(500),
	 [QA_STAT] numeric(38,18),
	 [TAXABLE] nvarchar(500),
	 [CERT_REQD] nvarchar(500),
	 [CARRIER] nvarchar(500),
	 [GL_ACCT] nvarchar(500),
	 [AGC] nvarchar(500),
	 [REQUESTOR] nvarchar(500),
	 [PR_NUM] nvarchar(500),
	 [PR_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [MRP_NETTABLE] nvarchar(500),

	 [SO_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [EXPED] nvarchar(500),
	 [UNIT_PRICE_ADV_STAT] nvarchar(500),
	 [BO_LINE] nvarchar(500),
	 [LAST_DEL] numeric(38,18),
	 [UM_SCALAR] nvarchar(500),
	 [REC_TOLER] nvarchar(500),
	 [DEL_COUNT] numeric(38,18),
	 [LINE_CMNT_CTR] numeric(38,18),

	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--CREATE PROC bulk_load_PO
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO GLOVIA_PROD.PO
(PUR_CCN 1, PO_NUM 2, PO_LINE 3, MAS_LOC 4, ITEM 5, REVISION 6, VEN_ITEM 7, VEN_REVISION 8, STK 9, QTY_ORD 10, QTY_REC 11, REQD_DATE 12, UM 13, UNIT_PRICE 14, WO_NUM 15, WO_LINE 16, OPERATION 17, SO 18, QA_STAT 19, TAXABLE 20, CERT_REQD 21, CARRIER 22, GL_ACCT 23, AGC 24, REQUESTOR 25, PR_NUM 26, PR_LINE 27, MRP_NETTABLE 28, COMP_DATE 29, CLOSED_DATE 30, SHIP_TO_NAME 31, SHIP_TO_NAME2 32, SHIP_TO_ADDR1 33, SHIP_TO_ADDR2 34, SHIP_TO_ADDR3 35, SHIP_TO_ADDR4 36, SHIP_TO_ADDR5 37, SHIP_TO_ADDR6 38, SHIP_TO_CITY 39, SHIP_TO_STATE 40, SHIP_TO_POST_CD 41, SHIP_TO_COUNTRY 42, SHIP_TO_ADDRESS_OVERRIDE 43, SALES_CCN 44, SO_LINE 45, EXPED 46, UNIT_PRICE_ADV_STAT 47, BO_LINE 48, LAST_DEL 49, UM_SCALAR 50, REC_TOLER 51, DEL_COUNT 52, LINE_CMNT_CTR 53, ORIGIN_CNTRY 54, DISPATCH_CNTRY 55, BOOK_RATE 56, BOOK_RATE_DIV 57, FROZEN_DATE 58, VCH_TOLER 59, NSD_ITEM_DESC 60, PRICE_CHANGE_DATE 61, REV 62, REC_AMT 63, REC_HOME_AMT 64, VOUCH_QTY 65, BO_NUM 66, CCN 67, VQ 68, VQ_LINE 69, OUTSIDE_PROCESSING 70, RP_SCHED 71, RP_OPERATION 72, SEIBAN 73, DEMAND_SOURCE 74, PRP 75, TAR_COST1 76, TAR_COST2 77, TAR_COST3 78, TAR_COST4 79, TAR_COST5 80, TAR_COST6 81, TAR_COST7 82, LAST_RTV 108, FPO_NUM 109, FPO_LINE 110, USER_ALPHA1 111, USER_ALPHA2 112, USER_ALPHA3 113, USER_NUM1 114, USER_NUM2 115, USER_NUM3 116, USER_DATE 117, USER_TIME 118, DEPT 119, MAT_SUPPLY 120, SET ANSI_NULLS ON

ALTER PROC [Config].[AddTableToRefresh] @RowGroup [NVARCHAR](50),@DbName [NVARCHAR](50),@SchemaName [NVARCHAR](50),@TableName [NVARCHAR](50),@FileSystem [NVARCHAR](50),@TableKeysArray [NVARCHAR](500),@ConnectionType [NVARCHAR](50),@DataQuery [NVARCHAR](4000),@CurrentProcess [BIT],@TableMaxSCN [NVARCHAR](20),@RefreshInterval [NVARCHAR](15),@RefreshNumber [INT],@StagingSchema [NVARCHAR](20) AS
BEGIN
    -- body of the stored procedure
    INSERT INTO Config.DataRefreshSchedule (RowGroup, DbName, SchemaName, TableName, FileSystem, TableKeysArray, ConnectionType, DataQuery, StagingSchema)
    VALUES(@RowGroup, @DbName, @SchemaName, @TableName, @FileSystem, @TableKeysArray, @ConnectionType, @DataQuery, @StagingSchema)

    DECLARE @ScheduleId INT = (SELECT TOP 1  Id 
                                FROM Config.DataRefreshSchedule 
                                WHERE RowGroup = @RowGroup
                                AND DbName = @DbName
                                AND SchemaName = @SchemaName
                                AND TableName = @TableName
                                AND FileSystem = @FileSystem)
    INSERT INTO Config.DataRefreshScheduleDetail (ScheduleId, CurrentProcess, TableMaxSCN, RefreshInterval, RefreshNumber)
    VALUES(@ScheduleId, @CurrentProcess, @TableMaxSCN, @RefreshInterval, @RefreshNumber)

    UPDATE Config.DataRefreshScheduleDetail
    SET LastRefreshStart = GETDATE(),
    NextRefresh = GETDATE()
    WHERE ScheduleId = @ScheduleId

END
GO

source:
Schema = 'GLOVIA_PROD'
Table = 'JE_DET'
FilePath = 'unified-data-cluster'
keyColumns = 'JE_CCN,JE,JE_DET,JE_LINE'
updateString=''
insertString=''

splitCols = keyColumns.split(',')
matchedString = ''
for string in splitCols:
    matchString += 'src.' + string + ' = tgt.' + string + ', '
matchedString = matchString.rstrip(', ')

dfDataOrigionalPath = f"abfss://{FilePath}@modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/{Schema}/{Table}/Processed/"
dfDataChangedPath = f"abfss://{FilePath}@modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/{Schema}/{Table}/NotProcessed/"
dfDataOriginal = spark.read.load(dfDataOrigionalPath, format='delta')
df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable(f"delta.{Table}")
tgt = spark.table(f'delta.{Table}')
src = spark.read.format("parquet").load(dfDataChangedPath)
src.registerTempTable("changed")
import delta

#Set location of the data
loc = f"/unified-data-cluster/{sch}/{tbl}"
df = (spark
        .read
        .parquet(loc))
